message.name: ERR_INVALID_MOTIVATIONS_RULE_SET
message.locale: The rule set for motivation %1s is illegal. There must be a unique subclass for AbstractEligibility.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_SCHEMA_FOR_MOTIVATION_RESULT
message.locale: The motivation result schema %1s is invalid.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_MOTIVATION
message.locale: A MotivationIntakeApplicationLink must include a Motivation.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_INTAKE_APPLICATION
message.locale: A MotivationIntakeApplicationLink must include an Intake Application.

message.name: ERR_USER_DOES_NOT_HAVE_ACCESS_TO_MOTIVATION
message.locale: %1s tried to access a motivation to which that user does not have access

message.name: INF_VALIDATION_ELEMENT_SHOULD_APPEAR_COUNT
message.locale: The %1s element at the %2s level should appear in the Motivation result xml document %3s times but it is present %4s times

message.name: INF_VALIDATION_SUMMARY_ELEMENT_ATTRIBUTE_MISSING
message.locale: The summary element at the %1s level is optional but when it is present the %2s attribute must be populated

message.name: INF_VALIDATION_MANDATORY_ELEMENT_ATTRIBUTE_MISSING
message.locale: The attribute %1s must be populated on the %2s element at the %3s level. This attribute is missing from one or more %2s elements.

message.name: INF_VALIDATION_ELEMENT_UNIQUE_ATTRIBUTE_DUPLICATE
message.locale: The value of the %1s attribute of the %2s element at the %3s level must be unique. The value %4s appears more than once.

message.name: INF_VALIDATION_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_INVALID_CODETABLE
message.locale: The value of the %1s attribute of the %2s element at the %3s level must be a valid code from the %4s codetable. The value %5s is not a valid code.

message.name: INF_VALIDATION_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_INVALID_RECORD
message.locale: The value of the %1s attribute of the %2s element at the %3s level must be a valid record from the %4s table. The value %5s is not a valid record.

message.name: INF_VALIDATION_HOUSEHOLD_MEMBERS_NOT_REFLECTED_IN_RESULT
message.locale: Every member of the household must be represented by a Person element under every Result element at the %1s level. The household contains %2s members, there is one or more Result elements which do not contain %2s Person elements.

message.name: INF_VALIDATION_MANDATORY_ELEMENT_MISSING
message.locale: A minimum of 1 %1s element must be present at the %2s level.

message.name: INF_VALIDATION_MISSING_LOCALIZABLE_TEXT
message.locale: The %1s record correpsonding to the %2s attribute of the %3s element at the %4s level does not contain a %5s

message.name: INF_VALIDATION_RESULT_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: The %1s attribute on the %2s element at the %3s level is optional, but when it is not present the %4s record corresponding to the %5s attribute must contain a %6s.

message.name: INF_VALIDATION_RESULT_CONTEXTID_UNIQUE
message.locale: Where a contextID is specified on the Result element at the %1s level, the combination of resultID + contextID must be unique.

message.name: INF_VALIDATION_FAIL
message.locale: Validation failed with no meaningful output.
